title3.about1: AODC is a company born out of a passion for creating the best data centers. Its management and employees have nearly two decades of operational experience and knowledge in creating and managing the implementation of data processing centers from the conceptual stage, through design, to construction, deployment, optimization, and servicing.
title3.about2: AODC possesses a unique range of practical and theoretical knowledge verified by successful implementations of many data centers, and confirmed by certificates including ATD, CDCP, CDCS, TSI-Professional. The company has implemented proven procedures that allow proper diagnosis of customer needs regarding Data Center infrastructure and transform them into real conceptual designs and execution projects.
title3.about3: Our company is able to carry out projects based on the protection of classified information within the meaning of the Act of August 5, 2010 (Journal of Laws of 2016, item 1167). It has at its disposal a classified information protection system along with a structure responsible for ensuring their security.
title6.1: AODC is comprised of people who have been actively involved in the implementation of Data Center facilities for almost 20 years and have successfully designed and supervised the implementation process of the largest such facilities in Poland, both for public and local government institutions, as well as for commercial entities.
